DOC.criteria: subject age 1870 year old chief complaint reproducible neck pain NDI score 10 great . Subjects exclude recent whiplash significant trauma , demonstrate red flag item malignancy , radiculopathy , myelopathy , fracture , metabolic disease , rheumatoid arthritis , longterm steroid use , history neck surgery .
